comments.text:
I confessed my love for this guy I liked when I was in 5th/6th grade when I 
was in 7th grade. I knew that he didn't like me, but I always believed what 
my mother said when I was small, "When a guy is treating you badly, he was 
just searching for your attention." So I confessed and his reply was, "Huh? 
*you*? You're stupid, ugly, an idiot, fat, and should I say more? And what 
do you have for me to like you back?"

I moved on and decided that I'll be skinnier and get prettier, and in a few 
years, I'll prove him and show him what he missed : ) It has been a year 
and a half and I'm getting improvements on my body, face and grades. My 
friends were always there to be beside me and comfort me, pushing me with 
support every time I wanted to quit. What I'm trying to say is that no 
matter what that girl and your ex do or say, always stay strong and move 
on, because there are other guys out there that may be your knight in 
shining armor. Perhaps God put him in your life to see if your heart was 
strong enough to endure him, then He will give you the man that truly 
deserves you and loves you with all his heart.

I'm here to support you, Dianne : ) <3
comments.author: Chrisalis Tangputri

THIS is what a true cover is. Akmu, Tablo and now Lydia are killing it. 
They've made the song their own style! I love how their covers reflect 
their interpretation of the song. Akmu was innocent and pure, Tablo had a 
"fuck you, I'm better off without you" type of vibe, and now Lydia is 
singing the song from the girl's point of view! I'm sorry I just really 
love yg's idea of covering Taeyang's beautiful song within the yg community 
because they're doing it so well! A true cover should reflect the way the 
one who is singing interpreted the song and show their true color <3 haha 
also love the colors with the music videos the whole monochrome scheme 
really fits :)﻿
